panels.description: Shows completed exchanges of the camel context
panels.title: Completed

panels.description: Shows failed exchanges of the camel context
panels.title: Failed

panels.description: Show the numbers of exchanges per second for a camel route
panels.title: Ex/sec $route

panels.description: Show the numbers of exchanges per second for a camel route
panels.title: Ex/sec $route
Execution Times Per Route Since Start

panels.description: Average execution time for a route
panels.title: Avg Exec time $route

targets.expr: min by (processor,route) (org_apache_camel_Processor{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",route="$route",type="processormappings",processor=~"$processor"}) * on(processor) (sum by (processor) (org_apache_camel_TotalProcessingTime{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",type="processors",processor=~"$processor"}) / sum by (processor) (org_apache_camel_ExchangesTotal{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",type="processors",processor=~"$processor"}))

panels.description: Average execution time for a route
panels.title: Avg Exec time $route

targets.expr: min by (processor,route) (org_apache_camel_Processor{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",route="$route",type="processormappings",processor=~"$processor"}) * on(processor) (sum by (processor) (org_apache_camel_TotalProcessingTime{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",type="processors",processor=~"$processor"}) / sum by (processor) (org_apache_camel_ExchangesTotal{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",type="processors",processor=~"$processor"}))

panels.title: Execution Times Per Route Over Last 30 sec

panels.description: Average execution time for a route
panels.title: Avg Exec time $route

targets.expr: min by (processor,route) (org_apache_camel_Processor{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",route="$route",type="processormappings",processor=~"$processor"}) * on(processor) (sum by (processor) (increase(org_apache_camel_TotalProcessingTime{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",type="processors",processor=~"$processor"}[30s])) / sum by (processor) (increase(org_apache_camel_ExchangesTotal{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",type="processors",processor=~"$processor"}[30s])))

panels.description: Average execution time for a route
panels.title: Avg Exec time $route

targets.expr: min by (processor,route) (org_apache_camel_Processor{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",route="$route",type="processormappings",processor=~"$processor"}) * on(processor) (sum by (processor) (increase(org_apache_camel_TotalProcessingTime{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",type="processors",processor=~"$processor"}[30s])) / sum by (processor) (increase(org_apache_camel_ExchangesTotal{namespace="$namespace",context="$context",type="processors",processor=~"$processor"}[30s])))
